main.name: Darshit Singh
main.description: I design and program websites and web applications of all types. I also have a personal blog where I write about software development. Check it out
main.bio: Hey there! I'm Darshit! I've been coding for over 8 years. Currently I'm working at Pristyn Care as a frontend developer. Yes, Javascript excites me and its libraries like React are just the cherry on top. I enjoy learning new things and then teaching them. Well that's learning twice because according to Richard Feynman, teaching is learning as well, haha. I spend most of my either reading, coding or playing guitar. Be sure to check my Github profile to see what I'm working on at present.

education.school: International Insitutue of Information Technology Hyderabad
education.degree: Btech in Electronics and Communication Engineering

testimonials.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, youll know when you find it.
